attributes.action: Offer a full and robust debate to decide who is telling the truth about CO2 emissions and climate change
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Who is telling the truth? Is climate change being caused by mankind and C02 emissions, or is it in fact caused by variations in the activity of the sun?The recent channel 4 documentary 'The Great Global Warming Swindle' raised many isses that deserve a full debate before government policies are made to address climate change.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
